definitions.text: a structure in which animals lay eggs or give birth to their young
a gang of people (criminals or spies or terrorists) assembled in one locality
furniture pieces made to fit close together
inhabit a nest, usually after building
examples: birds are nesting outside my window every Spring

definitions.text: move or arrange oneself in a comfortable and cozy position
examples: We cuddled against each other to keep warm
The children snuggled into their sleeping bags
